content:
Here a first shot at this in Swift: https://github.com/fhircast/fhircast-adapter-macOS

I made a short demo with Osirix DICOM viewer:
https://github.com/fhircast/fhircast-adapter-macOS/blob/master/ShortDemo/ShortDemoMacOSAdapter.mov

I'm really out of my element here, especially the "view constraints". I let the defaults kick in. @Pascal Pfiffner : Maybe someone in your team would be interested in checking that?
Thanks for the notification Martin, great to see that FHIRcast is relatively straightforward to implement natively on the Mac!
